name: Sir Veillance
description:
Arduboy game created for #LOWREZJAM 2020. Help Sir Veillance (a knight and secret agent) infiltrate an evil base by moving the *ahem* surveillance monitors around. See how fast you can reach level 15 and challenge the ~hard levels~

Controls:
Arrow Keys
Z (A button)
X (B button)

Art based on works by Kenney and VECTORPIXELSTAR
